HelpBalloon.title: Maxnumber of recipients
HelpBalloon.content: Imaging that you want to advertise a product per newsletter that is only available in limited quantities. In this case, you would like to limit the number of newsletters sent. When creating a mailing, you can define the maximum number of mails to be sent in the send settings. The selection of which recipients on the mailing list receive the mail is a random process. In order to select the maximum number of mails to be sent, you must have a one-off authorization. Contact your support if you are interested in this possibility.
